Future orientations ● Balance between regional and city-region/sub-regional and local approaches. of regional policy ● New Conservative-Liberal Democrat Coalition government has announced plans to dismantle regional planning structures and RDAs in England and replace them with local enterprise partnerships

Major regional policy tools ● Grants for infrastructure and planning are the main policy tool. ● A few programmes seek to support regional economic development strategies, clusters and workforce development
Source: Calculations based on data from the US Bureau of Economic Analysis and OECD Regional Database
